author: dlr
msg: Add in-line comments about several known issues with OS X Keychain
support, including lack of TTY prompting, prompting even when
concurrency-related race condition with that same API.

author: maxb
msg: and SVN_SUBDIRS (the autoconf substitution providing its value) to
* configure.in: Remove all the --disable-config-subdir, SVN_SUBDIRS code.
Equivalent code is introduced in build/ac-macros/svn-macros.m4.
Replace the macro call SVN_SUBDIR_CONFIG and the manipulation of SVN_SUBDIRS
with the single macro call SVN_EXTERNAL_PROJECT, which does both.
which is AC_REQUIRE-d by SVN_EXTERNAL_PROJECT, and provides much the same
functionality as the code moved from configure.in.
(SVN_EXTERNAL_PROJECT): ...to this, and augment and clean up.

author: maxb
msg: * configure.in (SVN_EXTRA_INCLUDES): Remove this totally static autoconf
substitution, instead just placing the literal data in Makefile.in.
